page.title: 12EMERGENCY SERVICES
page.content:
{POLICE} We have a Police house in Old Village Road where our local policeman lives. His Headquarters and main workplace are at Hessle (25km) and he has a police car for his work.
{DOCTOR A doctor from South Cave (7km) holds a surgery in the village hall on Monday, Wednesday and Friday, but our nearest hospital is at Beverley (10km)
{FIRE Our nearest fire services are based at Beverley (10km) and Brough (10km). { {TELEPHONE Most people in the village have their own telephone at home, but there is a public telephone box which is used by about a quarter of the people we asked
